parameters: セギ裸2
face01
Actor1_1

Eventually, she regained consciousness, but... her memory
remained muddled.
I kept the death of Yuia a secret from her.

Even if I had told her, I seriously doubted she would have
understood at that time.

She was that exhausted... regretting the fact that she
couldn't save her son.

\N<Rozaro>Segi-san, how are you feeling today? Why don't you try going
outside for a bit?
セギ裸_疑問
\N<Segi>...

\N<Rozaro>...You should eat something. If you keep this up, you'll
ruin your health.
セギ裸_疑問
\N<Segi>That child... must be hungry by now...

\N<Rozaro>...No matter how much you regret the past, it can't be
helped. You did what you could, didn't you?
セギ裸_疑問

\N<Segi>That's not true... I'm sure there was more I could have
done... That's why that child isn't by my side now...

\N<Rozaro>...Segi-san, let's leave this place. If you stay here,
you'll always be haunted by the past.
セギ裸_疑問
\N<Segi>No... I can't do that.

\N<Rozaro>Listen to me. It's unfortunate about Riia, but you can
always have more children.

\N<Rozaro>I won't hesitate to help with that. It could be said to be
Riia's reincarnation, right? If we do that, Yuia would also
be pleased.
セギ裸_疑問
\N<Segi>Yuia-sama would...?

\N<Rozaro>Yes, that's right. You shouldn't be bound by the past
forever. Let's live looking forward together.

At the mention of her once husband... Yuia's name, she
smiled faintly.

Thinking of her husband who was no longer in this world, and
mourning the child she lost due to her own failure.
In my arms, she cried... and then she smiled.
セギ03
